documented and rolledout barcode system in Shipping Warehouse that interfaced with ERP barcode software UPS and FedEx Resulted in saving approximately 4200 manual transactions monthly increased data integrity and reduced work hours Modified verified validated and trained on a paperless HR training system that resulted in saving 32 hours of manual data entry a week and volumes of paper Initiated
